name: Tester Wanted
categories: Single-player;Adjustable Text Size;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Family Sharing
description: Help an incompetent game developer test out a bunch of game ideas he came up with in a desperate attempt to make it big. Don’t worry, everything will totally go according to plan! He’ll be keeping an eye on your progress anyway.

name: Dominated by: Yandere Goth Femdom Girlfriend
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Family Sharing

name: Stuck in a loop
description: Stuck in a Loop is an innovative puzzle game where you don’t control the character… you program it. At each level, analyze the situation, plan the right instructions, and let the robot execute the plan. Thinking, logic, and creativity: your best allies to break the loop!

name: Brew or Die
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Keyboard Only Option;Mouse Only Option;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Brew or Die – an RPG game with TBS elements, where potion brewing is a matter of life, duty, and... possible wealth!

name: 封神演义沙盘模拟器

Expand your territory, develop your economy, and unite ancient China in your legendary conquest!

name: Flux Empyrean
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Family Sharing
description: Flux Empyrean is an open-world mystery where knowledge is your only form of progression. Sail a vast ocean planet, navigate by the stars, and uncover a forgotten past. Use instruments and logic to solve mysteries in this atmospheric, narrative-driven exploration game.

name: Gun Garden
description: Gun Garden is a dungeon crawler top-down shooter with rogue-like elements. Explore rooms, find gear, fight enemies, and level up your stats as you progress through the various floors, attempting to find the lost treasure of the Gun Garden.

name: 超光速小队 Demo
categories: Single-player;Game demo;Steam Achievements;Adjustable Difficulty;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Partial Controller Support;Steam Cloud;Stats;Steam Leaderboards
description: ​​This is a turn-based strategy adventure game. Assemble a five-hero squad, each with unique strengths. Collect mysterious artifacts, build potent hero abilities, defeat powerful monsters, and eliminate galactic threats.​

name: Serpent Rising
description: A Realtime Strategy (RTS) game like none before! Attack, defend, build, explore, kidnap, steal, scorch earth, hunt, domesticate animals, evolve or devolve, evade radiation, starvation and predators, be good or evil, as you command your tribe in a post-apocalytic world turned archaic and brutal.

name: Tales of Eden: Midgard
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Stereo Sound;Family Sharing
description: Midgard is a single-player, unforgiving, action-RPG with a handcrafted open world steeped in Norse mythology. Encounter intense combat and level up your character's skill sets to fight your way across the kingdoms of Midgard. Save the people from evil as you trade, craft, hunt and fish to survive!

name: 仿品一號 | Imitation: No.1
description: Imitation: No.1 is a first-person 3D puzzle game with a mechanical-craft style. Explore freely, uncover clues, and operate strange machines to create “slides” said to hold the essence of things. Dive into an alchemist’s memory and reveal secrets beyond gold.

name: EmyLiveShow: Beach Days of Sun and Moon Demo
description: Join the beach games of four charming girls during the day or their dark fetish fantasies at night. Choose your side at the Sun and Moon hotel!

name: LingTian2 Demo: Your Destined Prince
description: LingTian 2 is a gorgeous and exquisite otome visual novel game. You are ordinary girl experiencing a sweet royal romance with Prince LingTian of Fang Kingdom! The game features over 1,000 stunning scenes, full voice acting, a main storyline, and 10 interactive sections.

name: Critical Ops - Dead Zone
description: Critical Ops - Dead Zone is a multiplayer shooter where players must kill enemies to complete specific objectives.

name: 限界シェフ
developers: 株式会社ワンコネクト
publishers: 株式会社ワンコネクト
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Partial Controller Support;Family Sharing
description: 限界までドバドバ注げ！ 狂気のワンボタン・クッキングアクション。君は“最後の一滴”までいけるか？

name: Slots & Daggers
description: A retro-fantasy roguelike inside a slot machine. Steady your blade - and spin!

name: Cousin Catcher
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Stats;Family Sharing
description: A wacky upgrade-driven, physics-based arcade game where you launch a baby into the sky, collect coins, and catch them on the way down!

name: CODE::LUX
developers: すやすやファクトリー
publishers: すやすやファクトリー
description: 泥沼化した世界大戦によって主要な電力インフラが失われ、文明が崩壊した未来。 遺物を求めて廃墟を渡るスカベンジャーのカイは、旧国家システムを掌握する謎の少女ミツハと出会う。 彼女の願いは、ただひとつ――かつて世界を支えた核融合炉を再び動かすこと。

name: holoVillage: Our Cozy Days
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Stereo Sound;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Farm, fish, mine, craft, and decorate your home in this cozy multiplayer life sim. Venture into dungeons and take on bosses outside the village for some added excitement. Share relaxing and thrilling moments alike with hololive talents as you shape your countryside life.

name: University Is Hell
description: A twisted narrative adventure with branching quests and deadly choices. Relive the same cursed day in a darkly comedic university full of violent classes, shady professors, and disturbing secrets.

name: My Summer Cottage
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Full controller support;Captions available;Family Sharing
description: Experience the life of an average Finn in My Summer Cottage. After losing your job, you retreat to your cottage to indulge in booze, hobbies, and questionable activities—while dodging responsibility and embracing the chaos around you.

name: Unseen
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Save Anytime;Steam Cloud;Stats;Steam Leaderboards;Family Sharing
description: A story-driven visual novel set within the dark corridors of the mind. Uncover your past through choices, shape your fate with dice. Unseen blends psychological horror and eldritch atmosphere into a haunting narrative full of forgotten memories and buried fears.

name: Hollowstride
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;LAN PvP;Co-op;Online Co-op;LAN Co-op;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Surround Sound;Family Sharing
description: Explore, build, and survive in a living, procedural world. Hollowstride is a multiplayer voxel sandbox in early development, offering a moddable foundation for your next great adventure.

name: Your Another Wife
description: Think you've had your fill of virtual waifu? It's Okay, step into the world of Your Other Waifu... She's developed a passion for dress-up and is waiting for you to join her in some delightful little games!

name: Ashen Destiny
description: Conquer randomized lands in a brutal turn-based strategy epic. Recruit generals with random stats and command massive armies in battle. Forge your legacy through tactical warfare, resource control, and ruthless ambition.

name: Pantheons Clash: Crystal
description: In the new era of the divine calendar, all things undergo changes and chaos in time and space. The Gate of the Realm has emerged, connecting the various divine realms······

name: Fucked by the Princesses of the Realm
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Family Sharing
description: You live in Drosk, a dusty land... and where you don't throw any. One day, a crazy old man tells you that beyond the Red Valley there is a kingdom where only beautiful and hot women live. Without hesitation, you head straight for the steamy tale you've just been told, and you find out it's real.

name: The Beast Is Yet To Come Demo
Pixel Dungeons
description: A turn-based pixel dungeon game where every move counts. Drop bombs, unlock doors, and outsmart enemies in short tactical levels. Easy to pick up, challenging to master. Play at your own pace with no time pressure.

name: QuickFire
description: QuickFire: This Wild West shootout has no skill cooldowns—your speed decides victory.

name: 久美子之死：昭和少女血色告白
description: 1988年，日本泡沫经济破灭前夕，化身被冤枉成嫌犯的刑警，侦查青梅奇怪自杀案，牵连出持续20年的连环杀人案秘密，穿梭烟酒与霓虹的昭和街头，在人心与生死的抉择中，搜查蛛丝马迹，找出血案真相。

name: Echoes of the HIve Demo
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;LAN Co-op;Shared/Split Screen Co-op;Shared/Split Screen;Game demo;Remote Play Together
description: Team up with friends in this 2D fantasy sandbox adventure! Explore mysterious worlds, craft powerful gear, battle monsters, and delve deep underground to uncover secrets and challenge epic bosses.

name: Perfect Diamond
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Shared/Split Screen PvP;Shared/Split Screen;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Adjustable Difficulty;Keyboard Only Option;Remote Play Together;Family Sharing
description: Perfect Diamond is a fast-paced puzzle game made for the NES. ROM included! Slide puzzle blocks into the grid to fill lines. Try to survive as the pieces move faster and faster. 3 single-player modes, local multiplayer battle, battle vs CPU.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Police DLC

name: Path of Gear: Blacksmith's Legend Demo
description: Path of Gear: Blacksmith’s Legend is a timeline-based roguelite strategy game. As a legendary blacksmith whose weapons are too powerful to wield, you must command adventurers in battle. Explore random maps, gather materials, forge gear, and face powerful foes!

name: The Next Stop Demo
description: Play Chapter 0 of The Next Stop: a narrative point & click adventure set in a haunting subway. Interrogate passengers, solve puzzles, and begin uncovering what lies beneath the surface.

name: ロボロビ
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Color Alternatives;Custom Volume Controls;Partial Controller Support;Family Sharing
description: ROBOROBI is a brutal 2D action platformer. Our little buddy Roborobi just can’t stop moving. Master a variety of moves to take control, and clear every stage to achieve victory.

name: Pet Desktop Adventure
categories: Single-player;Custom Volume Controls;Mouse Only Option;Playable without Timed Input;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Pet Desktop Adventure is your good company when you are working. Join a great adventure with your pets on your deskrop. You will facing waves and waves of enemies, take a good care of your pets, form an adventure team and stop your enemies.

name: Sunset Suckerpunch
categories: Single-player;Full controller support;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Subtitle Options;Family Sharing
description: Meet K8E: a talking, transforming motorcycle-sword-gauntlet. Drive her to meet your enemies, and wield her to crater them into the asphalt. Don't let them take her voice, too.

name: Astral Takers
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Steam Cloud;Family Sharing
description: Shape your fate with the power of summoning in an immersive JRPG!

name: PHARMA INC ™ SIMULATOR
description: Build your own pharma empire—on fair play or greed. Face the consequences of every decision in this darkly humorous, satirical sim: set market prices, manage production, boost your brand, make tough choices... and see where they take you.

name: Tavern Maid's Daily Life
description: In 'Tavern Maid’s Daily Life' you play as a maid working at the 'Red Fox Tavern', serving all kinds of customers and enjoying a cozy, eventful everyday life. Between casual chats and daily chores, you’ll gradually uncover the deeper stories and mysteries of the fantasy world around you.

name: Delve
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;PvP;Online PvP;LAN PvP;Shared/Split Screen PvP;Shared/Split Screen;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Steam Cloud;Remote Play on TV;Remote Play Together;Family Sharing
description: Delve is a multiplayer puzzle-platformer where players control adorable creatures as they dig through underground caverns in search of treasure.

name: Forced Entry
description: A masked serial killer has Forced Entry into your home knocking you out and locking you into the basement, You must now try to escape before its to late. Can you escape or will you become another victim of this relentless butcher.

name: College Baseball: Dynasty Builder
description: Your wait for a college baseball game is over. College Baseball: Dynasty Builder lets you take control of a college program, recruit top talent, manage your roster, and build a powerhouse over multiple seasons.

name: QPet Zoo
description: A cartoon stylized idle zoo simulator designed to sit at the bottom of your screen allowing you to work on other tasks while caring for your zoo and animals!
